messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Grady Mikhalyov has just admitted to us that they are a syndicate agent, aprehend them

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We have faith in our sec

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Grady Mikhaylov is the culprit, use deadly force if needed as they have admitted to capital crimes and appear to be dangerous

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Please confirm with a message to central command from a head, and provide a valid reason, as recent events have made us lose trust.

xoxo - Steve from accounting

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
That was not us



xoxoxo- Steve

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Automatic recall, since Grady Mikhalyov has been known to be a syndicate agent (by self confession). Please have a trusted head call the shuttle next time.
Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Captain's Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Your HoP is barred from making shuttle calls as he threatened me

-xoxox steve

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Massive bluespace translocation detected.
